Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: zellij
Description: A terminal workspace with batteries included

Arguments.Name: --max-panes
Arguments.Description: Maximum panes on screen, caution: opening more panes will close old ones

Arguments.Name: --data-dir
Arguments.Description: Change where zellij looks for plugins

Arguments.Name: --server
Arguments.Description: Run server listening at the specified socket path

Arguments.Name: -s
Arguments.Description: Specify name of a new session

Arguments.Name: -l
Arguments.Description: Name of a predefined layout inside the layout directory or the path to a layout file

Arguments.Name: -c
Arguments.Description: Change where zellij looks for the configuration file

Arguments.Name: --config-dir
Arguments.Description: Change where zellij looks for the configuration directory

Arguments.Name: --simplified-ui
Arguments.Description: Allow plugins to use a more simplified layout that is compatible with more fonts (true or false)

Arguments.Name: normal
Arguments.Description: In `Normal` mode, input is always written to the terminal, except for the shortcuts leading to other modes

Arguments.Name: locked
Arguments.Description: In `Locked` mode, input is always written to the terminal and all shortcuts are disabled except the one leading back to normal mode

Arguments.Name: resize
Arguments.Description: `Resize` mode allows resizing the different existing panes

Arguments.Name: pane
Arguments.Description: `Pane` mode allows creating and closing panes, as well as moving between them

Arguments.Name: tab
Arguments.Description: `Tab` mode allows creating and closing tabs, as well as moving between them

Arguments.Name: scroll
Arguments.Description: `Scroll` mode allows scrolling up and down within a pane

Arguments.Name: enter-search
Arguments.Description: `EnterSearch` mode allows for typing in the needle for a search in the scroll buffer of a pane

Arguments.Name: search
Arguments.Description: `Search` mode allows for searching a term in a pane (superset of `Scroll`)

Arguments.Name: rename-tab
Arguments.Description: `RenameTab` mode allows assigning a new name to a tab

Arguments.Name: rename-pane
Arguments.Description: `RenamePane` mode allows assigning a new name to a pane

Arguments.Name: move
Arguments.Description: `Move` mode allows moving the different existing panes within a tab

Arguments.Name: prompt
Arguments.Description: `Prompt` mode allows interacting with active prompts

Arguments.Name: tmux
Arguments.Description: `Tmux` mode allows for basic tmux keybindings functionality

Arguments.Name: --layout-dir
Arguments.Description: Set the layout_dir, defaults to subdirectory of config dir

Arguments.Name: --theme-dir
Arguments.Description: Set the theme_dir, defaults to subdirectory of config dir

Arguments.Name: --mouse-mode
Arguments.Description: Set the handling of mouse events (true or false) Can be temporarily bypassed by the [SHIFT] key

Arguments.Name: --pane-frames
Arguments.Description: Set display of the pane frames (true or false)

Arguments.Name: --mirror-session
Arguments.Description: Mirror session when multiple users are connected (true or false)

Arguments.Name: --on-force-close
Arguments.Description: Set behaviour on force close (quit or detach)

Arguments.Name: --copy-command
Arguments.Description: Switch to using a user supplied command for clipboard instead of OSC52

Arguments.Name: --copy-on-select
Arguments.Description: Automatically copy when selecting text (true or false)

Arguments.Name: --scrollback-editor
Arguments.Description: Explicit full path to open the scrollback editor (default is $EDITOR or $VISUAL)

Arguments.Name: setup
Arguments.Description: Setup zellij and check its configuration

Arguments.Name: --dump-layout
Arguments.Description: Dump the specified layout file to stdout

Arguments.Name: --generate-completion
Arguments.Description: Generates completion for the specified shell

Arguments.Name: --generate-auto-start
Arguments.Description: Generates auto-start script for the specified shell

Arguments.Name: --dump-config
Arguments.Description: Dump the default configuration file to stdout

Arguments.Name: --clean
Arguments.Description: Disables loading of configuration file at default location, loads the defaults that zellij ships with

Arguments.Name: --check
Arguments.Description: Checks the configuration of zellij and displays currently used directories

Arguments.Name: --index
Arguments.Description: Number of the session index in the active sessions ordered creation date

Arguments.Name: -c
Arguments.Description: Create a session if one does not exist

Arguments.Name: --simplified-ui
Arguments.Description: Allow plugins to use a more simplified layout that is compatible with more fonts (true or false)

Arguments.Description: In `Normal` mode, input is always written to the terminal, except for the shortcuts leading to other modes
